ygData.subject: Re: First time player
ygData.msgSnippet: ... sorted out ... playing a ... for me as a ... As a first time Pally the most important thing to do watch your lay hands!  It has saved my Pally numerous
ygData.messageBody:
--- In EverQuest@y..., CthulhuXL@a... wrote:
> Hello, ahm a first time player in fact I have to get things
sorted out
> with tech support before I can play but anyway ahm planning on
playing a
> Dwarven Paladin and I wondered if anyone had any tips in general
for me as a
> first time gamer on evercrack?
>
> STM
>
> "Don't take your pineal gland for granted. Pamper it!
> Essential Oils! Rubdowns! It could save your ass
> someday."
> - Tlg'manh, Unspeakable Oath 14/15

As a first time Pally the most important thing to do watch your lay
hands! It has saved my Pally numerous times. And hot key all the
skills you can.
